pages.text: $(li)The Map is a useful item that can be used to view explored terrain and mark landmarks.$(br)$(li)Cartographers will exchange this item by Emeralds.

$(li)You can find Maps in Loot Chests too.$(br)$(li)Maps and Empty Maps can be inserted in an Atlas to have a very big map in one only item.$(br)$(li)To use a Map, first right click in an Empty Map. Then, just explore the surroundings until the Map is complete.$(br)$(li)A Map can be placed in an Item Frame to use it like part of your decoration.
